posts.title: USB Powered Vacuum Cleaner
posts.content: Keep your work space looking immaculate by constantly sucking up any dirt or crumbs with this USB powered vacuum cleaner. It plugs directly into your PC’s USB port and features two different power settings for heavier dirt and dust.

posts.title: The Drunk Diet
posts.content: Get into the best shape of your short lived life when you embark on the self destructive journey outlined in the drunk diet. This diet will have you drinking, chugging, and snorting your way to a thinner you. You may die young, but at least you’ll look great.

posts.title: Melting Cat Skeleton Candle
posts.content: Burn the melting cat skeleton candle and unleash the fiery, wild beast that lives inside. Once burned, this unique candle leaves you with a peculiar keepsake for your room – a kick-ass metallic feline skeleton rather than a dried up pile of melted wax.

posts.title: Bluetooth Typewriter Keyboard
posts.content: One up that hipster writing his avant-garde novel using a feather and scroll by candle light by using the Bluetooth typewriter keyboard. It features an old school design that simulates the tactile clicky feel of a vintage typewriter so you can write in style.

posts.title: Wall Mounted Triple Dry Food Dispenser
posts.content: Keep your most frequently used ingredients handy without sacrificing counter space by storing them in this wall mounted triple dry food dispenser. It comes with 3 13 ounce canisters and features a flexible paddle wheel that won’t ever crush your food.

posts.title: Convertible Bean Bag Chair
posts.content: Transform any part of your home into an impromptu guestroom using this comfy convertible bean bag chair. It comes filled with super soft shredded foam and can be easily stretched out into a full size bed that is large enough to accommodate two adults.

posts.title: Tactical Tomahawk
posts.content: Enemies won’t stand a chance against you with the tactical tomahawk firmly in your stonecold hands. With its razor sharp ax head, steel body, and crowbar built into the bottom, this is the go to weapon when you need to get out of a sticky situation.

posts.title: Elevation Training Mask
posts.content: Maximize your workout <del>while looking like a serial killer</del> with the elevation training mask. Training with the mask simulates the conditions of high altitudes, creating pulmonary resistance that strengthens your diaphragm, ultimately increasing your stamina and lung capacity.

posts.title: Brain Specimen Coasters
posts.content: Study for your anatomy final while knocking back a few drinks using these brain specimen coasters. Ideal for biology majors, the coaster set features sliced up brain images that come together to form a realistic model of the human brain when stacked.

posts.title: Marinade Infusing Meat Tenderizer
posts.content: Cook up meat so succulent you’ll convert vegans with it – using the marinade infusing meat tenderizer. Besides tenderizering the meat, it comes with sixty steel pikes that poke tiny holes in the meat so the the flavor seeps into the core when marinating.

posts.title: 11-Foot Teddy Bear
posts.content: Transform your bedroom into the ultimate snuggle spot by bringing in this giant 11-foot teddy bear. This enormous teddy features a jubilant expression on his face along with an ultra soft exterior and an even fluffier interior that makes him ideal for laying on top of.

posts.title: Multi-Vitamins For Drinkers
posts.content: You can now live a healthy life style while also being a raging alcoholic – all thanks to these multi-vitamins for drinkers! These multi-vitamins are the real deal, created specifically to help drinkers replenish nutrients needed for healthy liver function and much more.
